aws::graph::propositions: # Piper PA-38-112 Aircraft Information
The aircraft make is Piper.
The aircraft model is PA-38-112.
The aircraft was manufactured in 1978.
The aircraft has an Airworthiness Certificate classified as Normal.
The aircraft has a Tricycle landing gear type.
The aircraft's last inspection was an Annual inspection on May 17, 2012.
The aircraft has 1 Reciprocating engine.
The aircraft's airframe total time was 2782 hours at the time of accident.
The aircraft has an Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT) installed.
The Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT) was not activated.
The registered owner of the aircraft is Rivair LLC.
The operator of the aircraft is Leandro A. Rivera.
The aircraft registration is N99DM.
The aircraft category is Airplane.
The aircraft serial number is 38-78A0487.
The aircraft has 2 seats.
The aircraft's certified maximum gross weight is 1670 pounds.
The engine manufacturer is Lycoming.
The engine model is O-235.
The engine is rated at 112 Horsepower.
No operating certificates were held for the aircraft.
The pilot was 62 years old.
The pilot occupied the left seat.
No second pilot was present.
No toxicology was performed on the pilot.
The pilot's last Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) medical examination was on June 25, 2012.
